user_preferences: Based on the user preferences and command history, it seems that Dmitriy has a tendency to dim the lights rather than turning them off completely. Therefore, it would be more accurate to say that Dmitriy prefers to dim the lights rather than turning them off entirely.

intent_analysis:
- **Request Type**: Device Control
- **Identified Situation**: Dmitriy wants to turn off all lights that are currently dim. The current state of the lights indicates that two of them are at a dim level (20% brightness).
- **Content Verification**: No verifiable match found
- **Refined Command**: Turn off meross-Light-Strip (22e11820-64fa-4bed-ad8f-f98ef66de298) and meross-Light-Strip (571f0327-6507-4674-b9cf-fe68f7d9522d)
- **Confidence**: High (Verified/Obvious)
- **Reasoning**: The command was to turn off all dim lights. I checked the current brightness levels of the available light strips. The light strips with IDs 22e11820-64fa-4bed-ad8f-f98ef66de298 and 571f0327-6507-4674-b9cf-fe68f7d9522d were both at a dim level of 20%, which is considered dim. Therefore, I will turn off these two light strips. The other light strip (ID: 363f714d-e4fe-4052-a78c-f8c97542e709) is at 90% brightness and will remain on.
